page.title: 19FUN RUN
page.content: On October 20th. our village had a fun run to raise money to pay for the showers at the new village hall. It was a hot afternoon. All the runners met at the recreation ground at 2.30p.m.. There were 86 of us altogether.We had to run along Cadley to the Shears Inn,then up the hill to Herridge Farm and Tinkerbarn. From there it was downhill through Brunton and Collingbourne Kingston and along the main road to the Recreation groumd again. The course was five and a half miles long.The start was made by Mr. Gordon firing a shot gun and then we all charged out of the field and down Chick's Lane. It took me 45 minutes and I broke my record of last year of 46 minutes.My mum got in 10 minutes after me.We all had medals for finishing.A big crowd was there.
